content.text: Hi
here is the content of the mini guide written by
ma’am for your review:
Mini Guide 4-The 2025 SEO Playbook The Shifts You Can’t Ignore (If You Want to Rank).docx

it looks professional, well-reasoned, and valuable. It’s not just up to date but actually ahead of the curve. It aligns perfectly with Google’s evolving priorities, addresses client concerns in the post-AI update era, and reinforces our internal positioning as experts in future-ready SEO.

content.text: Here is the mini guide written by Daya ma’am

Sandip’s feedback: It's really well written. Nothing to add from my side except one small suggestion. Including a few data-backed proof points could take it from great to premium. Maybe just one client result or a case-style stat would add that extra milage.
For example: “A B2B SaaS client cut CAC by 37% in 60 days after switching to these metrics.”
Feedback added and some more. Here’s the link:
Mini Guide 3 - The ROI Mythbuster.docx
please work on the banner image for this guide and ensure that it is high quality. Below, I’m sharing some of the live guides URLs for image reference and color combination.
please check the graphics.
